page.title: 18POLTERGEIST AT LEA CROSS
page.content: Two years ago in Lea Cross there were some strange happenings. The family living in a house - previously a Post Office - were building an extension. The family cat was in a room with the window closed but the door left open. The family went out and when they returned the cat was found dead on the floor and the door was closed and locked, with one window open. That night the family went to bed as usual and heard strange noises.Several items were found to be moved in the morning. These strange happenings kept going on for several weeks and then called the police to see if there was evidence of a burglary. There was none. After several incidents of this kind it was decided that there were poltergeists in the house, so the family decided to pull down the interior walls, there were no more problems from that day.
